评论概述: Exactly what I needed for Holiday Vending
评论详情: This is a great jacket in a medium weight. Sizing is pretty accurate and there was even enough room in the shoulders/arms to move around and restock my booth without removing it. Neckline really beautiful. I wore an underbust corset over, it so Im not sure how much the back will tighten for an hourglass effect.

This jacket was the perfect addition to my last-minute steampunk costume! The design is stunning, with a dramatic high-low hemline and intricate Victorian-inspired details that instantly elevate any outfit.  The fit was flattering, and the material was comfortable enough to wear for an entire evening. It paired beautifully with accessories to complete the steampunk look, and I received so many compliments throughout the event.  If you need a statement piece for a costume or a unique jacket to stand out, this is a fantastic choice. Highly recommend for steampunk, gothic, or Renaissance-inspired styles!

I normally wear XL or L if sized big.  I bought a 2x in this jacket and it fits well....shoulders a little wide but not noticeable.  I've received many compliments while wearing this at a Victorian themed Christmas fair.
Very tight in the shoulders. The corset back helps with the bust area, if it needs to be looser, but not the shoulders. I couldn't even lift my arms. Returned and got a bigger size

评论概述: The fit is good and is just what I needed.

I bought this for a Halloween costume. I was looking for a jacket, but this was more of a blouse. The material was thin and didn’t provide the structured fit I was seeking. It didn’t fit properly. I usually wear L/XL in tops. I purchased an XL, and the sleeves were too long, making the puffy part of the shoulder sit in the wrong place. The button was in an odd place (I’m short waisted). I would have had to do decent amount of altering to get it to fit me, and I already paid $60 for the blouse. I didn’t have time to exchange and I decided to go in a different direction, so I returned it.

Tight through the back and shoulders. Unlined. Need longer arms and are more roomy. The bust is unlined and therefore the seaming rolls and does not lay properly. I may deconstruct this and add a panel in the back, and do something about the bust, but other than that it is good.
Looks like it Is shown. However, thinnish cottony feel that is definitely not coat or jacket thickness. So it doesn't have good "drape" quality.

This jacket gave exactly what I needed it to give!! It paired perfectly with a ruffled top (also Amazon) and the look was perfect for a choir event. I did not get a pic, but the corset ties in the back not only added even more fierceness to the look, but helped to snatch my waist since I ordered a size large instead of medium. I will go with my normal size when I order the red one. It washed with no issues and dried quickly on a hanger. I would not put this in the dryer. It took very well to the iron on the polyester setting. I used starch to make sure the slight lift in the shoulders was not lost. My only drawback is that the sleeves are a tad shorter than I prefer, but I'll never wear it without a long sleeved top so I'm ok with that. Overall I love it!

I'm giving this item 3 stars because while it fits nicely and I think it would look lovely with my planned outfit, I'm likely going to have to return it due to the smell. I'm going to try airing it out first but with the intensity of the smell I'm not hopeful.
Comfortable. Fits well. Fun and enjoyable.

评论概述: Cute but the material is like a blouse, not a jacket.
评论详情: This jacket is super cute, and I had high expectations based on other comments. But the material is less like a jacket and more thinner like a very nice blouse. So it’s not a coat or jacket. But it is cute. It’s not wrinkle free and has creases from shipping. I’m going to iron it and see if it helps. I am in between an XL and XXL, so I got the XL. It is snug and does not close but there is enough stretch to make it work without it closing. I’m 5’7” and 225 lbs and very busty. I would’ve been more comfortable in the XXL but it wasn’t available.

This coat runs true to size. Very stylish you can dress it up or dress it down. Definitely eye catching I can't say enough it's just a little bit punk, goth looking. Just absolutely beautiful. Definitely worth grabbing expecially for the holidays.

评论概述: Very elegant, can be dressed up or down, very flattering!
评论详情: Absolutely love the jacket! I have to wear "statement" pieces for work in fashion, and with the right pairing the jacket actually acts like a Victorian blazer. As far as "warmth," it doesn't necessarily keep you warm, it didn't make me too hot while working but could easily be worn as a light jacket during the spring or fall (in southern areas) but wouldn't recommend as an actual "coat" purchase. Material is lovely, super flattering, has some stretch, and I would recommend buying your size or one size up depending on how you want to wear it. If you want to wear something thicker underneath, (I am wearing a lightweight, long-sleeve, button down in the photo) you should probably go up one size. The corseting in the back allows you to make the fit more custom in case you want a tighter or looser fit.
